#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int arr[1000001];
int arr1[1000001];
void solve()
{
    int i,j;
    for(i=2;i<=1000000;i++)
    {
        if(arr[i] == 0)
        {
            for(j=i+i;j<=1000000;j=j+i)
                arr[j]=1;

        }

    }
    for( i=2;i<=1000000;i++)
    {
        if(arr[i]==0)
            arr1[i]=arr1[i-1]+1;
        else
            arr1[i]=arr1[i-1];
    }

}
int main()
{
    solve();
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int a,b;
        cin>>a>>b;
        cout<<arr1[b]-arr1[a-1]<<endl;

    }
    return 0;
}
